project.description: The name of the project to add ngx-formwork to.

helperPath.description: Path to place helper files relative to project root

config.description: Generate a formwork.config.ts file and wire provideFormwork(formworkConfig) instead of injection tokens

includeSyncValidators.description: Whether to include validators (sync) setup via injection tokens or config

includeAsyncValidators.description: Whether to include async validators setup via injection tokens or config

configurationPath.description: Path where to save the configuration that is to be used by schematics and builders
